entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
